extends ScrollArea
implements AutoHide, MouseMovementListener, MouseWheelListener, MouseButtonListener

      • Menu

        public Menu(ElementManager screen,
            com.jme3.math.Vector2f position,
            com.jme3.math.Vector2f dimensions,
            com.jme3.math.Vector4f resizeBorders,
            java.lang.String defaultImg,
            boolean isScrollable)
        Creates a new instance of the Menu control
        Parameters:
        screen - The screen control the Element is to be added to
        position - A Vector2f containing the x/y position of the Element
        dimensions - A Vector2f containing the width/height dimensions of the Element
        resizeBorders - A Vector4f containg the border information used when resizing the default image (x = N, y = W, z = E, w = S)
        defaultImg - The default image to use for the Slider's track
        isScrollable - Boolean defining if the menu is a scrollable list

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(java.lang.String caption,
                        java.lang.Object value,
                        Menu subMenu,
                        boolean isToggleItem)
        Adds a MenuItem to the Menu
        Parameters:
        caption - The display caption of the MenuItem
        value - The value to associate with the MenuItem
        subMenu - The associated Sub-Menu that should be displayed with thisMenuItem. null if N/A
        isToggleItem - Adds a toggleable CheckBox to the MenuItem is true

      • addMenuItem

        public void addMenuItem(java.lang.String caption,
                        java.lang.Object value,
                        Menu subMenu,
                        boolean isToggleItem,
                        boolean isToggled)
        Adds a MenuItem to the Menu
        Parameters:
        caption - The display caption of the MenuItem
        value - The value to associate with the MenuItem
        subMenu - The associated Sub-Menu that should be displayed with thisMenuItem. null if N/A
        isToggleItem - Adds a toggleable CheckBox to the MenuItem is true
        isToggled - Sets the default state of the added CheckBox

        public void setPreferredSize(com.jme3.math.Vector2f preferredSize)

      • pack

        public void pack()
        Forces the Menu to rebuild all MenuItems. This does not need to be called, however it will not effect anything negatively if it is.
